name: gizmosql-ui
description: GizmoSQL UI - A web-based SQL interface for GizmoSQL servers

scripts.package: pnpm bundle && cd dist && npx @yao-pkg/pkg . --targets node20-linux-x64,node20-macos-arm64,node20-win-x64 --output bin/gizmosql-ui
scripts.package:linux: pnpm bundle && cd dist && npx @yao-pkg/pkg . --targets node20-linux-x64 --output bin/gizmosql-ui-linux-x64
scripts.package:macos: pnpm bundle && cd dist && npx @yao-pkg/pkg . --targets node20-macos-arm64 --output bin/gizmosql-ui-macos-arm64
scripts.package:macos-x64: pnpm bundle && cd dist && npx @yao-pkg/pkg . --targets node20-macos-x64 --output bin/gizmosql-ui-macos-x64
scripts.package:win: pnpm bundle && cd dist && npx @yao-pkg/pkg . --targets node20-win-x64 --output bin/gizmosql-ui-win-x64

author: GizmoData LLC
